content: striking doily beret pattern i used bernat satin sport yarn and a h / 5mm hook any soft sport or probably dk yarn should work this starts with rounds 1 - 5 of the pineapple round doily pattern formerly at celt s vintage crochet chain chain 4 double_crochet double_crochet in 1st stitch st of chain * chain 3 2 double_crochet in same st repeat from * 6 times chain 3 join in 4th st of chain round 2 slip_stitch slip_stitch to next loop chain 3 1 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in same space * 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in next loop repeat from * 6 times join round 3 slip_stitch to center st of next loop chain 7 cluster over next 4 double_crochet cluster keeping last loop of each st on hook work i double_crochet in each st thread over and work off all loops at one time * chain 4 double_crochet in next loop chain 4 cluster over next 4 double_crochet repeat from * all around chain 4 join in 3rd st of chain round 4 chain 1 1 single_crochet chain 3 1 single_crochet in same space * chain 4 double_crochet in next cluster chain 4 1 single_crochet chain 3 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * all around ending to correspond join in 1st single_crochet round 5 slip_stitch into loop chain 4 treble_crochet treble_crochet in same space chain 3 2 treble_crochet chain 3 2 treble_crochet in same space * chain 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip next loop 2 treble_crochet chain 3 2 treble_crochet chain 3 2 treble_crochet in next loop repeat from * all around ending to correspond join round 6 sl st to between the middle two treble_crochet of the current group of three pairs of treble_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in same space * chain 6 treble_crochet in next single_crochet chain 6 single_crochet between middle two treble_crochet in next group of three pairs * repeat from * to * around join in top of first single_crochet round 7 ch3 5 double_crochet in ch6 loop *double_crochet in next treble_crochet 6 double_crochet in next ch6 loop double_crochet in next single_crochet 6 double_crochet in next ch6 loop repear from * to * around join round 8 ch3 skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet *double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet* repeat from * to * around join ** for a larger slouchier beret work another increase row here increase after 6 double_crochet round 9 - 11 ch3 skip first double_crochet double_crochet in each double_crochet around join round 12 ch3 skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet double_crochet 2 decrease *double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet decrease* repeat from * to * around join round 13 ch3 skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet double_crochet 2 decrease *double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet decrease* repeat from * to * around join round 14 repeat round 13 beret should now fit head snugly but not
